name: Magician's Assistant
description:
Help the magician (who is not introduced because I didn't have the dev time to do so) find the differences between the two pictures.

She can't really help you but I'm sure she'll be as cheerful as possible!

Have fun! 

PS : Press F4 for full-screen and F5 to change the scaling if you're having trouble with the maybe small window!

----------------------
Made with RPG Maker VX Ace for the RPG Maker Games in 1 Hour jam

Scripts : RME (RME Team), ORMS (RME Team) and Fullscreen++ (Zeus81)
Assets by surt under license CC0

Everything else (music, font) is from RPG Maker's base resources
